mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, blike, cno, bimage, mnickname, mmyimage from(select bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, blike, cno, bimage, mnickname, mmyimage from board b, member m where b.memail = m.memail order by blike desc) where rownum <= 12

select rownum as rnum, bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, blike, cno, bimage, mnickname, mmyimage from(select bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, blike, cno, bimage, mnickname, mmyimage from board b, member m where b.memail = m.memail and cno = #{cno} order by blike desc) where rownum <= 12
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, blike, cno, bimage, mnickname, mmyimage from board b, member m where b.memail = m.memail order by bdate desc
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, blike, cno, bimage, mnickname, mmyimage from board b, member m where b.memail = m.memail and cno = #{cno} order by bdate desc
select btitle from ( select btitle from board order by to_char(bdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:Mi:SS')desc) where rownum<=4;

select rno, rcontent, reply.memail, member.mnickname, to_char(rdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:Mi:SS') rdate from board, reply, member where board.bno = reply.bno AND board.bno = #{bno} AND reply.memail = member.memail
